author: Caitlin Owens
title: Diagnostic testing supply shortages threaten coronavirus response
description: There’s no clear strategy in place to resolve or prevent the shortages of testing supplies that have threatened the U.S. coronavirus response for more than a month. Why it matters: We can now run hundreds of thousands of coronavirus tests a week, but it’s sti…
content:
